column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Picked up a few pastries to bring with us back to Dallas. I was pleased they made it through the drive unscathed
column2: and they tasted delicious even though we didn't eat them right away after originally picking up. We tried the almond croissant (sooo good
column5: and the kouign-amann (this was my S.O.'s favorite of the bunch). Next time we're in Houston we're going to stay for a full meal as well. These pastries are going to be a must every time we go down now!
